name: SMASHY TOWN
description:
*Made for the 2015 SubZero festival in San Jose, Ca

Like Rampage on meth- Smash corporations and collect bitcoins. Fire, explosions, mayhem, giant babies with removable eyeballs-

Compete against 3 of your friends with 4 player local multiplayer action! CLIMB! SMASH! BURN! SPLODE! GET DAT COIN!

A Mysterious Doll Studios Game

Produced by James Id
